name: mtrixboar
description: Dashboard for visualizing data from MT-517 devices stored in PostgreSQL (replacement for DataPortal).

scripts.fix:ini-utf8: node -e "try{require('iconv-lite')}catch(_){process.exit(0)}" || npm i -D iconv-lite && node scripts/convert-ini-encoding.js
scripts.build:sensors: node -e "try{require('iconv-lite')}catch(_){process.exit(0)}" || npm i -D iconv-lite && node scripts/ini-to-sensors-json.js
